lines.text: He think he's bad and ain't got no class! I'm gon' rock this shotgun up his muthafuckin' ass!
Jimmy, if a snake were to bite me on my leg, what would you do?
Well, Bo! What if a snake were to bite me on my ass?
I guess you'd be a dead muthafucka!
We are taking you AND your car to sunny California. Can you dig it?
You need a ride, honey? Well, I'll tell you what I'll do... I'll give you a ride... for a ride! Hee! Hee! Hee!
This place gives me the creeps. Why do you think the boss uses this as our hideout?
He likes the old lady. He get his kicks watching her torture pretty broads.
